analysis.description:
LCToken.openLottery (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#162-209) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balances[msg.sender].lotteryNum >= 0 && balances[msg.sender].lotteryNum <= 9 && balances[msg.sender].indexHash == blockhash[temuint]
	- temuint == balances[msg.sender].lotteryNum

LCToken.account_lock should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#80-81)
LCToken.account_team should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#82-83)
LCToken.val1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#61-62)
LCToken.val2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#62)
LCToken.val3 should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#63)
LCToken.val4 should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#65-66)
LCToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#60-61)
Token.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#4-5)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#142-144:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#164:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_to' of StandardToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#25) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of StandardToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#25) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#37) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOfEth (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#41-42) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOfLockTime (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#45-46) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of LCToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#294-295) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of LCToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#295-296) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_hashValue' of LCToken.addHash (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#103) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_lotteryNum' of LCToken.buyLottery (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#139) is not in mixedCase

LCToken.val1 (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#61-62) is never used in LCToken
LCToken.val2 (/unique_chucks/40/0xeef69ecf4851f7ee36196f26da23f6229855076b.sol#62) is never used in LCToken
